summary: Julia becomes an orphan and is taken in by Laura and Daniel, one of her father's childhood friends. The child makes Daniel remember the horrifying past he had chosen to bury.
cast: Juan Diego Botto|Bárbara Lennie|Mágica Pérez|Marc Rodríguez|Àgata Roca|Nora Navas|Cristina Azofra|Adrián Bermúdez|Pedro Muiño|Monti Castiñeiras|Dolors Tuneu|Maria Pau Pigem|Carles Prats|Celia Rico Clavellino|Txitxu Llamas|Xènia Abadal|Raúl Páez|Josep Espígol|Casimir Sancho|María Luisa Sales|María Jesús Rueda|Rosa M. Guillamet|Ramón Román|Pere Caminals|Pilar Romano|Yolanda Edo|Úrsula Valle|Rafael Ortiz|Inmaculada Ávalos
title: Dictado
